name: renaizant
description: Renaizant is an ongoing performance management platform that helps employees grow and succeed.
goals: Use the power of ML and AI for contextual suggestions
Add Integrations with powerful platforms as Jira, SalesForce, GitHub, Slack, Skype, Office 365, Plaid, Stripe, etc.
Add new features concepts and development to cover a set of standard tools for performance review
solutions: We used Just In Time feedback approach to make performance review a continuous activity and integrate powerful popular platforms to track the progress of users who even don't use the application.
Renaizant has advanced features to cover common performance review needs, and makes this process easy and fun.
outcome: Developed a fully functioning MVP within one year.
